rules_text:
When It Came from the Bog enters, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Swampcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]In the depths of Lake Zhava, an ancient evil stirs.[/i]
